title: Uncle Vanya
brief_description: A Chichester Festival production supervised by Sir Laurence Olivier of Anton Chekhov’s “Uncle Vanya. Although shot in black and white this is a definitive interpretation of the text which is often presented as a VCE English text. A very unified production starring Sir Laurence Olivier, Joan Plowright, Sybil Thorndike and Michael Redgrave.
